docs.snippet: Prices of bonds surged forward again yesterday on the Stock Exchange except in the case of leading foreign loans, which closed irregularly lower. Gains of 1 to 5 points made by a long list of domestic corporation bonds enabled many of those issues to...
docs.lead_paragraph: Prices of bonds surged forward again yesterday on the Stock Exchange except in the case of leading foreign loans, which closed irregularly lower. Gains of 1 to 5 points made by a long list of domestic corporation bonds enabled many of those issues to attain the best prices for the year to date.

headline.main: PRICES GO HIGHER IN DOMESTIC BONDS; 1 to 5 Point Gains on Stock Exchange Result in Many New Peaks for 1933. FOREIGN LEADERS WEAK German Loans Depressed, but French Issues Move Up -- Brisk Rise on the Curb.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: AMER COUNCIL OF FOREIGN BONDHOLDERS INC

docs.snippet: LA PAZ, Bolivia, May 5 -- Bolivia desires a continuance of efforts to halt the war with Paraguay and believes if Paraguay could be induced to define her claims in the disputed territory the act would be "decisive," according to a message sent to five...
docs.lead_paragraph: LA PAZ, Bolivia, May 5 -- Bolivia desires a continuance of efforts to halt the war with Paraguay and believes if Paraguay could be induced to define her claims in the disputed territory the act would be "decisive," according to a message sent to five neutral American capitals tonight.
docs.abstract: Bolivia calls on neutrals to urge Paraguay to define region subject to arbitration

headline.main: CHACO PEACE BID MADE BY BOLIVIA; Calls on Neutrals to Urge Paraguay to Define Region Subject to Arbitration.

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: EACH year there are fewer countries that have not been brilliantly audited by Andre Siegfried. In this skillful and informing book he adds a whole new continent to the earlier panels of his screen of civilization. The day when he must weep like...
docs.lead_paragraph: EACH year there are fewer countries that have not been brilliantly audited by Andre Siegfried. In this skillful and informing book he adds a whole new continent to the earlier panels of his screen of civilization. The day when he must weep like Alexander begins to loom just as he is reaching the perfection of his technique.

headline.main: Andre Siegfried's Candid Survey of South America; His Brilliant Impressions of the Continent Carry a Philippic Against Our Influence IMPRESSIONS OF SOUTH AMER- ICA. By Andre Siegfried. Trans- lated by H.H. Hemming and Doris Hemming. Illustrated with drawings by Ione Robinson, and photographs. 192 pp. New York: Harcourt, Brace & Co. $2.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 8 -- The initiative taken by Bolivia in intimating to the Neutrals' Commission here that new conciliation proposals looking to settlement of the Chaco dispute with Paraguay would be seriously considered, was regarded in Latin-American...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 8 -- The initiative taken by Bolivia in intimating to the Neutrals' Commission here that new conciliation proposals looking to settlement of the Chaco dispute with Paraguay would be seriously considered, was regarded in Latin-American circles heer today as distinctly encouraging.
docs.abstract: Peace move by neutrals; attacks by both sides; sharp notes sent to Bolivia by Argentina and Chile

headline.main: CHACO PEACE MOVE MADE BY NEUTRALS; Washington Committee Invites ABC-Peru Group to Join in Meeting Today. ACTS ON BOLIVIAN HINT Conciliatory Body Also Has Word That Paraguay Is Ready to Arbitrate 'on the Widest Scope.'

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 12. -- Assurance of cooperation, in regard to the Chaco war between Paraguay and Bolivia was sent to the Council of the League of Nations today by the Commission of Neutrals, which has been exercising its good offices for peace...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 12. -- Assurance of cooperation, in regard to the Chaco war between Paraguay and Bolivia was sent to the Council of the League of Nations today by the Commission of Neutrals, which has been exercising its good offices for peace between the two countries.
docs.abstract: Wash neutrals notify League they will support peace effort; Bolivia asks definition of Paraguayan claims in disputed territory

headline.main: AID ON CHACO WAR PROMISED GENEVA; Washington Neutrals Notify League They Will Support Its Effort for Peace. NEIGHBORS TO TAKE STAND Argentina, Brazil, Chile and Peru Will Issue Joint Declarations Today.

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, May 13. -- President Alessandri signed a decree this afternoon declaring Chile's neutrality in the Chaco war. The document, the terms of which are similar to Argentine and Brazilian declarations, will be released tonight...
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, May 13. -- President Alessandri signed a decree this afternoon declaring Chile's neutrality in the Chaco war. The document, the terms of which are similar to Argentine and Brazilian declarations, will be released tonight simultaneously with those of the other two countries.

headline.main: NEUTRALITY SET UP BY ABC COUNTRIES; Argentina, Brazil and Chile Declare Positions in Chaco War, as Does Uruguay. BOLIVIA BEGINS OFFENSIVE Reports the Paraguayans Forced Back From Fort Alihuata, but Asuncion Claims Victory.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

headline.main: STERLING EXCHANGE RISES; Francs Remain Unchanged -- Gen- eral Market More Stable.

docs.snippet: Wall Street's philosophical view of yesterday's markets was that a corrective reaction was in order and that the moderate decline had improved the technical position. Trading on the Stock Exchange was unusually active for a Saturday -- 2,273,617...
docs.lead_paragraph: Wall Street's philosophical view of yesterday's markets was that a corrective reaction was in order and that the moderate decline had improved the technical position. Trading on the Stock Exchange was unusually active for a Saturday -- 2,273,617 shares, as compared with 2,094,000 on the previous Saturday.

headline.main: News, Comment and Incidents on the Stock Exchange and in the Financial Markets.
